availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Fletcher C. Andrew (San Joaquin County, California, Commissioner of Deeds)

body.p: San Joaquin County, California, harbormaster, clerk, and commissioner of deeds. Richmond City, Virginia, native. Married to Sophia Andrew. Father of Alice Andrew. Harbormaster in San Joaquin County, California, in 1850. Clerk in San Joaquin County in 1860. Commissioner of deeds for Kentucky in San Joaquin County in 1860. Treasurer and secretary of the California State Insane Asylum in San Joaquin County in 1863. Died on February 27, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, California, San Joaquin County, Stockton, p. 289A.
